features.title: Unlocked Mode
features.desc: CPU and GPU clock tweaks for FloppyKernel.

options.label: Enabled (Overclock)
options.desc: CL0 = 2.2 GHz (OC), CL1 = 2.496 GHz (OC), GPU = 1.209 GHz (OC), UV disabled.

options.label: MegaFloppy (Overclock, risky)
options.desc: CL0 = 2.2 GHz (OC), CL1 = 2.6 GHz (OC), GPU = 1.209 GHz (OC), UV disabled.

options.label: UltraFloppy (Overclock, risky)
options.desc: CL0 = 2.2 GHz (OC), CL1 = 2.704 GHz (OC), GPU = 1.209 GHz (OC), UV disabled.

options.label: CoolFloppy (Underclock)
options.desc: CL0 = 2.0 GHz (stock), CL1 = 2.112 GHz (UC), GPU = 897 MHz (stock), UV enabled.

options.label: BalancedFloppy (Overclock)
options.desc: CL0 = 2.2 GHz (OC), CL1 = 2.4 GHz (stock), GPU = 897 MHz (stock), UV disabled.

features.title: Force Permissive
features.desc: Force SELinux Permissive mode. For developers.

features.title: EMS Efficient Mode
features.desc: Enable EMS efficient scheduler mode. Reduces performance and improves battery.

features.title: Kill Init Protection
features.desc: Allow Power HALs and init scripts to modify kernel knobs. Enable if you want the ROM to control performance.

features.title: Legacy Timestamp
features.desc: Fixes video recording length issues on ROMs with legacy camera HALs.

features.title: Disable MSM Boost
features.desc: Prevent MSM Performance from overwriting CPU min/max frequencies. May reduce responsiveness.

features.title: Force Warm Reboot
features.desc: Preserve RAM on reboot to gather logs easier. Recommended only for debugging, can cause broken WiFi.

features.title: BPF Spoofing
features.desc: Spoof Linux version for BPF support. Managed externally; changing this manually may cause bootloops.

options.label: Partial spoofing
options.desc: Spoofs the uname only for netbpfload.

options.label: Full spoofing
options.desc: Spoofs the uname for several bpf-related services.
